text: Jameh Mosque of Gorgan is one of the monuments of Gorgan. This mosque is located next to the Bazaar Nalbandan. The mosque is built in the Seljuq dynasty and has spherical minaret on which are the Kufic line. == Sources == Category:Mosques in Iran Category:Mosque buildings with domes Category:National Works of Iran Gorgan
title: Jameh Mosque of Gorgan
